tool.name: ExtractMolecule
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of the Structure Checking tool to extract a molecule from a 3D structure.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: molecule_type
param.label: molecule_type
param.help: type of molecule to be extracted. If all, only waters and ligands will be removed from the original structure.

param.name: chains
param.label: chains
param.help: if chains selected in **molecule_type**, specify them here, e.g: ["A", "C", "N"]. (Json)
